import React, { useState } from "react"; const Contact = ({ data }) => { const [url, setUrl] = useState( "mailto:sagaarpkr@gmail.com?subject=subject&body=body" ); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [subject, setSubject] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); console.log(data); const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); window.open(`mailto:${email}?subject=${subject}&body=${name}: ${message}`); }; return (

); }; export default Contact;
